* Date: 4/27/08
* Time: 6pm-8pm
* Location: Sherlock's Baker Street Pub (<nowiki>[[http://maps.google.com/maps?f=l&hl=en&geocode=&q=sherlock%27s+pub&near=austin,+tx&ie=UTF8&ll=30.389387,-97.723303&spn=0.0462,0.058365&z=14&layer=c&cbll=30.372019,-97.724626&cbp=1,177.28684279383458,,1,0.17862393403824978|9012 Research Blvd]]</nowiki>)

=== Agenda ===

* Burn copies of Ubuntu
* Meet fellow users in the Austin area
* Show off the new release
